text:
RT @AishaS GOP runs the House, Senate and WH. 

Why couldn’t Trump get his own party to pass a bill to keep government running?

Simple question.

#TrumpShutdown

This shutdown was avoidable. The WH created this crisis & the GOP leaders in Congress refused to negotiate with Democrats. We must pass a bipartisan solution to fund the government, guarantee health care for millions of kids & protect Dreamers. Americans expect & deserve it.

They spent the entirety of 2017 trying to repeal the ACA and forcing through their #GOPTaxScam. Meanwhile, the vital priorities of the American people were cast aside.

A “good shutdown” is what @realdonaldtrump wanted. We will hold him and Republicans accountable.

It’s clear that negligence and incompetence are in the Republican DNA. This is the first time I can ever recall a party with control of the White House and BOTH chambers of Congress causing a government shutdown. #TrumpShutdown

The House bill has been rejected with bipartisan opposition. Time for a deal that solves the issues the vast majority of Americans support - funding the government, reauthorizing CHIP & protecting Dreamers.

The way forward is clear: Republican leaders and the President must pass a bipartisan solution like the one on the table to reopen the government, restore CHIP, and provide a place in America for DREAMers.   

The American people deserve nothing less.
If anything, tonight has revealed once again – the President does not have compassion for our fellow Americans who he put in this perilous situation.

But tonight when the President and the Republicans refused to let that bipartisan solution be put forward for a vote – it became crystal clear they are willing to play political games with American lives.
And the frustrating thing is – there’s a solution on the table right now. It’s supported by Republicans, by Democrats, and by most Americans.

President Trump and Congressional Republicans claimed they wanted a DACA solution that would provide relief to the hundreds of thousands of DREAMers who are American in every way except for a piece of paper.

The Republicans control the White House, Senate & House. With that power comes a basic responsibility to keep the government open.   

Tonight they failed, and now the American people will suffer. #TrumpShutdown
.@CoryBooker Statement on #TrumpShutdown: https://www.booker.senate.gov/?p=press_release&id=731 http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DT9rhjdWkAAlDII.jpg

RT @CoryBooker The Republicans control the White House, Senate & House. With that power comes a basic responsibility to keep the government open.   

Tonight they failed, and now the American people will suffer. #TrumpShutdown

RT @NancySinatra Just now > McConnell refused to allow vote on emergency bill to pay military families.
#TrumpShutdown

RT @EricHolder Republicans in safe gerrymandered seats can vote for #TrumpShutdown in spite of what their constituents want. Polls show American people overwhelmingly are for #Dreamers AND for CHIP health care for kids. We will fight for fair redistricting. @DemRedistrict
RT @JoyAnnReid To reiterate: Mitch McConnell DOES NOT CARE ABOUT CHIP. If he did, it would have been reauthorized 120 days ago. #TrumpShutdown

Exactly. It’s the #TrumpShutdown manufactured by Republicans. They know they will be blamed. In fact, Trump made that stark admission. https://twitter.com/shareblue/status/954710128023961601 QT @Shareblue Fox host: You can’t blame Dems for #shutdown when “you’re in charge of everything” https://shareblue.com/fox-host-shep-smith-you-cant-blame-dems-for-shutdown-when-youre-in-charge-of-everything/#.WmMMoJNfafk.twitter

RT @NaomiAKlein Bernie, saying it plain: "Let’s wrench power back from the billionaires | Bernie Sanders" https://www.theguardian.com/commentisfree/2018/jan/14/power-billionaires-bernie-sanders-poverty-life-expectancy-climate-change?CMP=share_btn_tw
What has been, that will be; what has been done,that will be done. Nothing is new under the sun! Ecclesiastes 1:9
I hope, based on last night's vote, that McConnell now changes his mind and begins to negotiate seriously. We must reopen the government as soon as possible.

I'm very disappointed that the Republicans chose to shut down the government. Leader McConnell insisted on going forward with a doomed vote rather than negotiating a serious agreement with the Democrats and Republicans who opposed him.

With the #TrumpShutdown in effect, I'll be in DC working to end the Republican manufactured obstruction. If you're at the #WomensMarch today in DC, join me as we gather to continue fighting for our values. We can't let up! http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DT_5yKCVAAA2izp.jpg

Due to the shutdown, I will not be able to attend the @wmnsmarchla. Instead, I will be in Washington, D.C. to fight for a for a long-term funding bill that supports our military, community health centers, CHIP, disaster relief, and protects Dreamers from deportation.
Should NOT cave to this radical hostage taking. More @SenateDems are ready to soon begin to abandon this insane #SchumersShutdown 8/8
Impossible to justify cancelling defense training & pay for military over demands for #DACA especially since doesn’t expire for weeks  7/8
Democrat position on #Shutdown untenable. Americans know it’s better to keep govt. open while continuing to negotiate these other issues 6/8
Shutdown hurting #DACA deal.Yesterday b/c Dem leaders busy dealing with shutdown they didn’t show up for DACA meeting with @WhiteHouse 5/8
But Democrats voted against government funding that expired last night, to gain leverage on an issue that doesn’t expire for 6 weeks 4/8
The remaining disagreement is over which other measures such as #EndChainMigration  #EndDiversityVisa or #TPS should be part of a deal 3/8
Strong majority of @SenateGOP & @HouseGOP support & @realDonaldTrump will sign a #DACADeal that has real #BorderSecurity #BorderWall 2/8
There is nothing in the funding bill the Democrats oppose.They voted against it & shutdown the govt. because it didn’t include #DACA 1/8

Which do we want:  More jobs, higher wages, bonuses and pay raises for millions?  Or fewer jobs, lower wages, more bankruptcies, and more companies fleeing our borders?  For CA Dems this seems to be a hard choice. Well, keep sending the jobs to Texas.... https://twitter.com/byronyork/status/954744157725216769 QT @ByronYork California legislators propose nearly doubling state corporate tax in response to Trump/GOP corporate tax cut. My love goes out to the #WomensMarch2018 – I'm with you in spirit. Unfortunately, because of the #TrumpShutdown I'm in the Capitol fighting for a solution that gets the government up & running while protecting our military, CHIP funding, Dreamers & more. 

We will prevail.

RT @instapundit Our approach is failing!  We must redouble our efforts! https://twitter.com/ByronYork/status/954744157725216769 QT @ByronYork California legislators propose nearly doubling state corporate tax in response to Trump/GOP corporate tax cut. RT @RepMarkMeadows A far cry from 2013, when Veterans were literally barricaded from visiting their own memorials. The #SchumerShutdown is a disaster and must end now. But I can tell you: @POTUS Trump and @SecretaryZinke are resolved to not weaponize this shutdown the same way President Obama did https://twitter.com/secretaryzinke/status/954722187658891264 QT @SecretaryZinke Ensuring our @NatlParkService parks are as accessible as possible. Wonderful to meet students from Illinois. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DT_aw80WkAAua_g.jpg

There’s nothing more powerful than a group of determined people marching and standing up for our nation’s values and for what we know is right. Standing in solidarity with those attending the #WomensMarch across the country.
Job fair aims to help those from #PuertoRico http://www.wesh.com/article/job-fair-aims-to-help-those-from-puerto-rico/15829008

We should do this immediately. https://twitter.com/senatedems/status/954761305424105472 QT @SenateDems Early this morning, @clairecmc tried to pass a bill to guarantee military pay and death benefits in the #TrumpShutdown. 
Republican Leader Mitch McConnell: I object. WATCH: http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DT_-GfsWsAEkcqE.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/954760561585246208/vid/320x180/rS1BliHgaOlfULNr.mp4

Republican Leader Mitch McConnell: I object. WATCH: http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DT_-GfsWsAEkcqE.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/954760561585246208/vid/320x180/rS1BliHgaOlfULNr.mp4

Republicans can't negotiate an agreement on what 87 percent of Americans agree on. That is where we are right now. https://qz.com/1184263/government-shutdown-americans-want-daca-so-why-cant-congress-make-a-deal/
I'm LIVE at the #WomensMarchDC. Tune in! https://www.facebook.com/pelosiforcongress/videos/2033578486887904/

RT @CoryBooker My love goes out to the #WomensMarch2018 – I'm with you in spirit. Unfortunately, because of the #TrumpShutdown I'm in the Capitol fighting for a solution that gets the government up & running while protecting our military, CHIP funding, Dreamers & more. 

We will prevail.

Instead of working to ensure our kids have health insurance, our Dreamers are safe, our community health centers remain open, and members of the military get paid, Republicans intentionally ran out the clock. We must act and pass a bipartisan deal.

Nancy sends a special message to everyone joining the Women's March in #SanFrancisco. Check it out! #WomensMarchSF #WomensMarch2018 http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/954816227842510848/pu/img/-R6E6ObDhqhxXT51.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/954816227842510848/pu/vid/320x180/CibHW7WaCfWnXq46.mp4
Happy birthday to my good friend and our terrific Ambassador to the United Nations, @nikkihaley.

For the first time in history, a one-party government was unable to keep the government going. That is pathetic. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DUA2k7BX4AALBKW.png https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/954822927429570560/vid/240x240/PEKtlTTZl2CrBebF.mp4

We are saying to Mitch McConnell and President Trump: You are going to have to start dealing with the real issues facing this country. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/954838117831364608/img/h08Natqpq9H10v3w.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/954838117831364608/vid/240x240/BHKozRoSv87GVJq1.mp4

RT @SenSchumer Getting people together -- that’s just about the opposite of what he’s done in these negotiations. That's why we're in this #TrumpShutdown. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DUAGgrMXcAA5O-t.jpg
Speaking on the Senate floor now. Watch here: https://www.senate.gov/floor/

Mitch McConnell is many things but he’s not dumb. He knows how to count. Bringing up a vote he knew was doomed an hour before the government shut down was absolutely irresponsible. This falls on his shoulders.

People are more determined than ever to build a nation based on love and compassion, not hatred or division. Congratulations to the women around the world who are once again sending a powerful message of solidarity today. #WomensMarch2018

When I look at our Dreamers, I know I am looking at the dream of who we are as a country. http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/954854905398857728/pu/img/CQdeh-yU7IkwT--k.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/954854905398857728/pu/vid/210x180/8Q8lOw5KlpHSKqAW.mp4

Here's why Democrats are standing up to Trump and Mitch McConnell: http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/954838117831364608/img/h08Natqpq9H10v3w.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/954838117831364608/vid/240x240/BHKozRoSv87GVJq1.mp4

When it comes to providing tax breaks to billionaires, Republicans will rush to get it done.

When it comes to passing a budget that protects the needs of working families—well, we are still waiting.

The #WomensMarch is about our values as a country -- protecting our health care and a woman's right to choose; reforming the criminal justice system; fair immigration policy and MORE. Now, we must vote come November 2018 so that we can win! http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DUBiPgsV4AANTfB.jpg

On the Senate floor, I talked about why the #SchumerShutdown is bad for our country and how it hampers disaster relief efforts for #Florida and #PuertoRico.   https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HGRjyM5iZa8&feature=youtu.be
We asked Republicans to pass a budget that would protect the needs of working families. They preferred to shut down the government instead.
RT @CNNSotu This Sunday @SenSanders joins @jaketapper for a live interview on #CNNSOTU. Tune in! http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DT7rZDkUQAANMSS.jpg
RT @mediasusan Proud to march with Team Pelosi today. We need This Leader, Not a creepy tweeter! http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DUBSbA6VoAAoa31.jpg
RT @cmarinucci Christine Pelosi @sfpelosi leads Minority Leader delegation of SF Women’s March, where thousands are gathered http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DUBNSrvVQAAndDN.jpg
In 2013 @SenSchumer said about government shutdown: “It's a politics of idiocy, of confrontation, of paralysis." https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VQdduxE7U9A&sns=tw

What’s standing in the way of a bipartisan agreement is the chaotic White House and the partisanship of Republican leaders. Americans don’t want this dysfunction — they want the government to work and to pass legislation that protects the people.
Republicans control the House, Senate and White House. The most fundamental responsibility of the governing party is to govern. I say to Republicans: Do your job.

People have come together across the country in good spirit & in a way that has made progress. But it doesn’t all count unless we vote.

To my supporters & the thousands that participated in #WomensMarchSF, I wish I could be there with you. I love & miss you. Let’s keep fighting! http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/954934118092976131/pu/img/al-7wVYG2lLJy05M.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/954934118092976131/pu/vid/320x180/QVPoOXnkFt-hOZcr.mp4

Join me in calling on Republican leaders to do the right thing and schedule a vote on a bipartisan resolution that will reopen the government and protect the Dreamers from deportation: https://secure.kamalaharris.org/page/s/trump-shutdown?source=tw180120
